questions: what do you know about alljobsusa
answers: ALLJOBSUSA is a platform connecting job seekers, freelancers, and employers in the USA.
It’s a trusted online job and freelance marketplace for American workers and businesses.
ALLJOBSUSA helps employers hire talent and freelancers find new opportunities.
You can explore the latest job listings on ALLJOBSUSA.
Sure! Check the job search section for available opportunities.
Check Jobs on browse jobs page.
Select a job and click the Apply button.
Sure! Go to jobs page and click on view job to apply.
Click on Apply button on job page to apply.
You can post a job on ALLJOBSUSA to connect with freelancers.
Our platform helps you quickly find skilled freelancers for your project.
Posting jobs is easy—just share the details and freelancers will apply.
As an Employer you can post a professional job from dashboard.
As an Employer you can post a freelance job from dashboard.
A Professional Job is like a regular job where a company is looking for talents to hire them.
In a Professional Job, a person applies and the company receives their application and can contact them.
A Freelance Job is a job where a company is looking for online talents to do work for them. Only freelancers can apply.
In a Freelance Job, a freelancer applies to a job and then the company will contact them.
A Proposal is for freelance jobs only, where a freelancer creates a proposal for an employer.
A Proposal is a kind of document in which a freelancer specifies the time and amount to do the work.
Yes! ALLJOBSUSA has remote and work-from-home opportunities.
You can browse remote jobs posted by employers.
Freelancers can also offer remote services to clients.
You can sign up directly on ALLJOBSUSA by providing your details.
Just click the signup button and follow the instructions.
Creating an account takes only a few minutes!

questions: can i sign up with google
answers: Yes! You can sign up using Google or create a new account with your email.
Currently, we support email-based signup and Google login.
Choose whichever method works best for you—social login or email.

questions: do i need an email to sign up
can i use phone number to register
answers: Yes, you’ll need a valid email address to sign up.
Currently, registration requires an email account.
Phone-based signup is not supported yet, but email works instantly.

questions: do i need to verify my email
answers: Yes, after signing up you’ll receive a verification email.
Please check your inbox and confirm your email to activate your account.
Verification ensures your account is secure and trusted.
Click on the login button and enter your credentials.
You can log in with your registered email and password.
Use the sign-in option to access your account.
Yes, you can log in with Google or your registered email.
Choose Google login or use your email and password.
We provide multiple login options for convenience.
If you can’t log in, first check that your email and password are correct.
Try resetting your password if you’ve forgotten it.
If the issue persists, please contact our support team.
Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page to reset it.
Enter your registered email to receive reset instructions.
You’ll get an email link to change your password.

questions: i didn’t get password reset email
answers: Check your spam or junk folder for the reset email.
Make sure you entered the correct email linked to your account.
If you still don’t see it, try again or contact support.
You can reach our support team through the contact page.
We’re always here to help! Visit the support section.
Send us a message via the help center and we’ll get back to you.
Freelancers are paid securely via Stripe once a job is marked completed.
Employers pay into the platform, and funds are released to freelancers after approval.
We ensure safe and secure payments with a small service fee.
Creating an account and browsing is free for everyone.
Employers pay only when posting jobs or hiring freelancers.
Freelancers pay a small service fee when they receive payments.
ALLJOBSUSA is focused on jobs and freelancers within the United States.
Currently, we specialize in the USA job market.
Employers and freelancers from the USA are our primary audience.
Go to your profile and click Edit Profile to update your details.
You can change your bio, skills, education, and work experience anytime.
A complete profile increases your chances of getting hired.
Go to the Post a Job section and fill in the details about the work.
Employers can specify budget, deadlines, and required skills.
Once posted, freelancers can start applying immediately.

answers: Find a job you like and click Apply.
Find a job you like and click Apply, and the Employer will contact you back.

Freelancers can attach samples and describe their experience.
